articles.title: Trump contradicts Netanyahu, says there's "real starvation" in Gaza
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has stated that there is "real starvation" in Gaza, contradicting Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's claims, and the U.S. plans to set up food centers in the region to address the worsening humanitarian crisis. [2, 3, 6]

articles.title: U.S., EU reach an 'across the board' agreement on tariffs
articles.description: The United States and the European Union have reached a tariff deal after a meeting between President Donald Trump and European Commission chief Ursula von der Leyen, averting a looming deadline for new import taxes. [1, 2, 4, 5]

articles.title: Gunman with history of mental illness kills 4 in attack at Manhattan office building
articles.description: A shooting in a Manhattan office building resulted in the deaths of at least four people, including the gunman who died from a self-inflicted wound. An NYPD officer was among the fatalities. [6, 9, 11, 12]
